Immigration bureau: Int l travel restrictions remain despite NCR being placed in GCQ tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740334 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740334/immigration-bureau-int-l-travel-restrictions-remain-despite-ncr-being-placed-in-gcq/story/ "As a consequence, our operations at the NAIA are still downscaled and our personnel there are still on skeletal and rotational deployment," Immigration Commissioner Jaime Morente said, adding that most of the international flights remain suspended. "Nonetheless, we assure the public that we are always ready to resume full, normal operations in our international airports once the government decides to ease or lift these travel restrictions," he added. Fri, 29 May 2020 13:12:17 +0800
Automatic passing rate for Civil Service Exam takers during quarantine 'fake news' -CSC chief tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740331 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740331/automatic-passing-rate-for-civil-service-exam-takers-during-quarantine-fake-news-csc-chief/story/ Civil Service Commission (CSC) chair Aileen Lizada on Friday branded as fake news the viral Facebook post that states those who will take the Civil Service Exam during the quarantine period will automatically get a passing rate. Fri, 29 May 2020 13:01:55 +0800
LRT1, LRT2, MRT3 reduce passenger capacity to observe physical distancing amid COVID-19 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740332 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/740332/lrt-1-lrt-2-mrt-3-reduce-passenger-capacity-to-observe-physical-distancing-amid-covid-19/story/ Longer lines are expected when LRT-1, LRT-2, and MRT-3 resume operations Monday as only a limited number of passengers will be allowed to board trains to observe physical distancing amid the COVID-19 pandemic. Fri, 29 May 2020 13:00:24 +0800
COVID-19 pandemic pushes Iloilo Catholic school to brink of closure tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740330 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/740330/covid-19-pandemic-pushes-iloilo-catholic-school-to-brink-of-closure/story/ Suffering a blow from the effects of the coronavirus pandemic, a nearly half-a-century-old Catholic school in Iloilo had contemplated closure, forcing its director to quit. Fri, 29 May 2020 12:54:37 +0800
Drilon wants repeal of Bayanihan law s penal provision tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740328 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740328/drilon-wants-repeal-of-bayanihan-law-s-penal-provision/story/ "The violators here are treated like criminals. We must emphasize that the Bayanihan to Heal as One law's principal purpose is to address an emergency, it is not basically a penal statute per se," Drilon said. "My proposal is to delete the entire Section 6 (penal provisions) because the acts in this section are likewise punished in other laws," he added. Fri, 29 May 2020 12:35:34 +0800
Over 860k workers in audiovisual industry need wage subsidy amid COVID-19-- FDCP tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740326 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740326/over-860k-workers-in-audiovisual-industry-need-wage-subsidy-amid-covid-19-fdcp/story/ "Ang laki po ang audiovisual industry and 'yun nga po dahil hindi kami nahahagip ng census studies ng PSA statistics, minsan po ay nakakalimutan yung aming pinagdadaanan at kalagayan ng mga nasa industriyang ito," Film Development Council of the Philippines chairperson Liza Diño said. Fri, 29 May 2020 12:20:55 +0800
Back-riding on motorcycles still not allowed, Eleazar says tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740324 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740324/back-riding-on-motorcycles-still-not-allowed-eleazar-says/story/ "Una, violation talaga sa physical distancing at siguro po wine-weigh nila ang pros and cons at sa ngayon, hindi pa po puwede. Kahit pulis hindi po puwede ang angkasan..." Police Lieutenant General Guillermo Eleazar said. Fri, 29 May 2020 12:03:47 +0800
Task force to add mobile checkpoints as NCR slips down to GCQ -Eleazar tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740323 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/740323/task-force-to-add-mobile-checkpoints-as-ncr-slips-down-to-gcq-eleazar/story/ Philippine National Police's Joint Task Force COVID Shield will deploy additional mobile checkpoints as the national capital region loosens down to general community quarantine after May 31, its commander said Friday. Fri, 29 May 2020 12:02:20 +0800
DOTr: Resumption of public transport in GCQ areas will be in 2 phases tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740319 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740319/dotr-resumption-of-public-transport-in-gcq-areas-will-be-in-2-phases/story/ “To effectively ensure and monitor the limited capacity and passenger load of all the public transport vehicles, the one meter social distance rule between persons will be strictly enforced inside ALL the PUVs and mass transport units, in adherence to health protocols,” the DOTr said. “In this New Normal' period, the DOTr will be harnessing the advantages of technology in implementing its initiatives for road-based transport, to minimize physical contact or face-to-face interaction to prevent the spread of COVID-19,” it said. Fri, 29 May 2020 11:00:59 +0800
Lawmakers push for bike lane networks for frontliners, safe parking spaces tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740318 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740318/lawmakers-push-for-bike-lane-networks-for-frontliners-safe-parking-spaces/story/ Several senators are pushing for the establishment of complimentary infrastructures that would encourage the use of bicycles in the Philippines amid the COVID-19 situation. Fri, 29 May 2020 10:51:22 +0800
Virus misinformation fuels panic in Asia tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740316 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/740316/virus-misinformation-fuels-panic-in-asia/story/ In April, a hoax was shared on Facebook in the Philippines post its lockdown suggesting a motorcyclist had been shot dead for ignoring a virus checkpoint. In fact, the footage -- which was viewed tens of thousands of times in multiple posts -- was of a police training drill. Fri, 29 May 2020 10:49:19 +0800
NCR's shift to GCQ may expose thousands to COVID-19, senator says tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740314 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740314/ncr-s-shift-to-gcq-may-expose-thousands-to-covid-19-senator-says/story/ "Reading the data available to us, it seems that we have not yet flattened the curve. Instead, this easing of the lockdown may expose thousands of Metro Manila workers and residents to a new wave of community transmission that will definitely overwhelm our already-embattled health system," Senator Risa Hontiveros said in a statement. Fri, 29 May 2020 10:21:43 +0800
3 ex-rebels abducted by suspected NPA members in Samar tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740313 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/740313/3-ex-rebels-abducted-by-suspected-npa-members-in-samar/story/ Three peacebuilders were abducted by suspected New People's Army (NPA) rebels in Motiong, Samar on May 27, the military said Friday. Fri, 29 May 2020 10:07:32 +0800
1 year exemption of health workers from PhilHealth premium rate hike sought in Senate tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740312 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740312/1-year-exemption-of-health-workers-from-philhealth-premium-rate-hike-sought-in-senate/story/ Health care workers in the country must be exempted for a year from the increase of premium rate to be collected by the Philippine Health Insurance Corporation (PhilHealth) amid the COVID-19 pandemic, according to Senator Manny Pacquaio. Fri, 29 May 2020 09:56:02 +0800
Palace defends easing of NCR quarantine amid rising COVID-19 cases tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740311 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740311/palace-defends-easing-ncr-quarantine-amid-rising-covid-19-cases/story/ Malacañang on Friday defended the government's decision to ease quarantine measures in Metro Manila despite the fact that more than 60% of the COVID-19 cases recorded on May 28 are in the National Capital Region. Fri, 29 May 2020 09:51:01 +0800
